::Epyon/Hot Rod::

Hot Rod lunges to the right, and goes into a roll, the shots hitting the
ground, where he had been. He gets up, and launches yet another two
missiles at SS, who is now rather low, and doesn't have as much reaction
time.

Epyon draws his saber, and sticks is streight down. He then drops.
Between him dropping, and SS coming up at mach 1, there should be no
reaction time, just impact...
